DOC.HEADLINE: EARNINGS
DOC.TEXT: Amoco Corp . reported a 74 % gain in first-quarter earnings as higher sales and margins more_than offset the impact of lower crude_oil prices . Last year ' s profit was decreased as the company reduced the value of an oil field off the coast of the Congo Republic . Not counting onetime factors present a year ago , profit rose 16 % . The Chicago-based company had a profit of $ 398 million , or 80 cents per share , for the three months ended March 31 , compared to $ 229 million , or 46 cents per share , for the same period in 1993 . Revenue fell 2.4 % to $ 6.8 billion , from $ 6.9 billion , mainly due_to a decline in crude_oil prices .
